mapper.select: SELECT r.rsc_cd, r.rsc_nm, o.vend_cd, SUM(l.lot_cnt) AS "LOT_CNT", r.saf_rtc FROM rsc r, rsc_ordr o, rsc_lot l WHERE r.rsc_cd = l.rsc_cd AND o.ordr_cd = l.ordr_cd GROUP BY r.rsc_cd, r.rsc_nm, o.vend_cd, r.saf_rtc
select LPAD(count(*), 3,0) as "ordrSCnt" from rsc_ordr where ordr_cd like '%'||#{ordrSCnt}||'%'

SELECT r.rsc_cd, r.rsc_nm, o.vend_cd, SUM(l.lot_cnt) AS "LOT_CNT", r.saf_rtc FROM rsc r JOIN rsc_lot l ON r.rsc_cd = l.rsc_cd JOIN rsc_ordr o ON o.ordr_cd = l.ordr_cd WHERE 1 = 1
AND rsc_nm LIKE '%' || #{rscNm} || '%'
GROUP BY r.rsc_cd, r.rsc_nm, o.vend_cd, r.saf_rtc
select r.ordr_cd, r.ordr_req_dt, v.vend_cd, v.vend_nm from rsc_ordr r join vend v on r.vend_cd = v.vend_cd AND v.VEND_NM LIKE '%'||#{vendNm}||'%'

SELECT r.rsc_cd, r.rsc_nm, o.vend_cd, v.vend_nm, od.ordr_cd, od.ordr_cnt, SUM(l.lot_cnt) AS "LOT_CNT", r.RSC_UNIT, r.saf_rtc, od.paprd_cmnd_dt FROM rsc r join RSC_ORDR_DTL od on r.rsc_cd = od.rsc_cd join RSC_LOT l on r.rsc_cd = l.rsc_cd join RSC_ORDR o on od.ordr_cd = o.ordr_cd join VEND v on o.vend_cd = v.vend_cd GROUP BY r.rsc_cd, r.rsc_nm, o.vend_cd, v.vend_nm, od.ordr_cd, od.ordr_cnt, r.RSC_UNIT, r.saf_rtc, od.paprd_cmnd_dt

SELECT r.rsc_cd, r.rsc_nm, o.vend_cd, o.ordr_cd, d.ordr_cnt, SUM(l.lot_cnt) AS "LOT_CNT", r.saf_rtc, d.paprd_cmnd_dt FROM rsc r JOIN rsc_lot l ON r.rsc_cd = l.rsc_cd JOIN rsc_ordr o ON o.ordr_cd = l.ordr_cd JOIN rsc_ordr_dtl d ON o.ordr_cd = d.ordr_cd WHERE r.rsc_cd = #{rscCd} GROUP BY r.rsc_cd, r.rsc_nm, o.vend_cd, o.ordr_cd, d.ordr_cnt, r.saf_rtc, d.paprd_cmnd_dt
SELECT r.ordr_cd, v.vend_cd, v.vend_nm, r.ordr_req_dt FROM rsc_ordr r JOIN vend v ON r.vend_cd = v.vend_cd

SELECT r.rsc_nm, r.rsc_typ, r.rsc_spec, r.rsc_unit, r.saf_rtc, r.rsc_avail, l.rsc_cd, SUM(l.lot_cnt) AS "lot_cnt" FROM rsc r, rsc_lot l WHERE r.rsc_cd = l.rsc_cd GROUP BY r.rsc_nm, r.rsc_typ, r.rsc_spec, r.rsc_unit, r.saf_rtc, r.rsc_avail, l.rsc_cd
